synopsis.text: Juuna and Senna, twin siblings, navigate the world together after a tragic accident robbed them of their parents and Juuna's memories. Living in the same high school, their bond remains unbreakable, offering solace amidst the lingering trauma of their past. However, as fragments of Juuna's forgotten past begin to resurface, the twins' peaceful existence is disrupted. A mysterious girl from Juuna's past reappears, claiming to be his childhood friend, causing Senna distress and confusion. As Juuna grapples with the truth hidden within his returning memories, he embarks on a journey to uncover the secrets of his past and safeguard his future with Senna. The twins' unwavering bond will be tested as they confront the enigmatic forces threatening to upend their idyllic life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
